com.jmr.wrapper.common

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jmr.wrapper.common.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    Networking Library Connection.java Purpose: Holds the TCP and UDP information on both the client and server side. It takes care of sending packets and encrypting them.
    Version:
    1.0 7/19/2014
    Author:
    Jon R (Baseball435)
